description:
Serious pads for serious brakes. Designed to help you get the most out of your Shimano 4-piston calipers, these durable metal pads bite hard in all conditions, so you can keep your speed right where you want it.

  • Finned Ice Technologies pulls heat away from the pads, reducing brake fade
  • Metal pads are hard-wearing and powerful
  • Comes with 1 left and 1 right pad, and 1 spring for 1 set of brakes
  • To replace both front and rear brakes, you will require 2 sets of these brake pads
  • Fits 4-piston SLX, XTR, and XT calipers
  • Compatible with XTR M9100 series, DEORE XT M8100 series, SLX M7100 series, CUES U8000 series
name: Shimano N-Type Metallic Disc Brake Pads
